animeTitle: Shinmai Maou no Testament Burst OVA (Dub)
otherNames: Shinmai Maou no Testament Burst: Toujou Basara no Shigoku Heiwa na Nichijou, 新妹魔王の契約者 BURST 第11話「東城刃更の至極平和な日常」
synopsis: An OVA that will be bundled with the seventh volume of the Shinmai Maou no Testament manga, to be released January 2016.
